Texts.Eng: Welcome back to Creon, Ambassador. Please accept this: it's a shield adorned with the Alliance's emblem. It was meant as a gift to the Protectorate, but now that they are gone, I wanted you to have it.

^orange;Admiral Lyiin ^reset;has requested that you ^green;join him in the ^orange;Command Center^reset;, ambassador. Please go and visit him as soon as possible, and make sure you bring your ^orange;Ambassador's Pass ^reset;with you.
